enterprise.sidebarTooltip: Your account has access to the enterprise features globally
enterprise.licenseDescription: Viewers are free with Baserow Enterprise. If a user has any other role, in any group then they will use a paid seat automatically.
enterprise.overflowWarning: You have too many non-viewer users and have used up all of your paid seats. Change users to become viewers on each groups members page.

samlSettingsForm.domainAlreadyExists: A SAML provider for this domain already exists
samlSettingsForm.invalidMetadata: Invalid XML metadata for the Identity Provider

deleteAuthProviderModal.title: Delete {name}
deleteAuthProviderModal.comment: Do you really want to delete this {type}?

loginWithSaml.continueWithSaml: Continue to the SAML SSO provider
loginWithSaml.requestError: This domain is not configured with SAML SSO

loginError.title: Something went wrong.
loginError.help: Please contact your administrator for help.
loginError.defaultErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to log in.
loginError.errorSsoFeatureNotActive: The SSO feature is not active. Please contact your administrator.
loginError.errorProviderDoesNotExist: This authentication provider doesn't exist or is not available.
loginError.errorAuthFlowError: An error occured during the authentication flow with the selected provider.
loginError.errorDifferentProvider: Please use the provider that you originally signed up with.

admin.name: Admin
admin.description: Can fully configure and edit groups and applications.

builder.name: Builder
builder.description: Can fully configure and edit applications.

editor.name: Editor
editor.description: Can fully edit data but not configure applications or groups.

commenter.name: Commenter
commenter.description: Can only read and comment on data.

oauthSettingsForm.invalidBaseUrl: The entered URL is not a valid provider URL
